item.description:
Wander past crop fields and cow pastures and through woods at the country’s oldest continuously operating farm. 
http://www.thetrustees.org/places-to-visit/northeast-ma/appleton-farms.html#t1
 
We will walk 2 to 4 hours, 4 to 6 miles at a brisk pace. 

Sorry DOGS are NOT allowed on this property. 

MAKE SURE TO SET YOUR CLOCKS 1 HOUR AHEAD SATURDAY NIGHT !

FEES: Trustees Members: FREE. Nonmembers: $3.

DIRECTIONS: Waldingfield Rd. Parking Area is at the corner Route 1A (County Rd) and Waldingfield Road in Ipswich, MA.  Parking for 20 cars.  If you are traveling North on Rt 1A Waldingfield Rd will be on your Left, traveling South it will be on your Right.

What makes Appleton Farms a special place?
Rolling grasslands, grazing livestock, stone walls, and historic farm buildings are part of this pastoral landscape – a rare glimpse into New England’s agricultural past. A gift of Colonel Francis R. Appleton, Jr., and his wife Joan, Appleton Farms is one of the oldest continuously operating farms in the country, established and maintained by nine generations of the Appleton family.
 

LIABILITY RELEASE:
AS A CONDITION OF ATTENDING THIS MEETUP, YOU AGREE TO hold harmless, and indemnify the organizer and her/his heirs, and all members and participants of the North Shore Not Too Intense Hikers group from any and all claims for injury, illness, death, and/or property damage including those caused by negligence, ignorance, inexperience and other reasons. You also agree to assume all mental, physical, financial, and/or other risk associated with this meetup. Hiking, bicycling, snow sports, kayaking, camping, alcohol consumption, and other activities pose inherent risks and dangers. Participation in these activities is voluntary and dependent upon your own personal judgment.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the parking lot on Waldingfield Road, Ipswich, MA. My car is a silver Honda Fit. I will send my cell # to those who are attending.

group.name: North Shore Not Too Intense Hikers

item.name: Appleton Farms, Ipswich, MA
